scripts.build: for DIR in packages/*; do (cd $DIR && npm run build); done
scripts.preinstall: for DIR in packages/*; do (cd $DIR && npm install); done
scripts._checkPortIsFree:
tools/port-is-free.sh $PORT || ( >&2 echo "ERROR: Port '$PORT' is taken!
"; exit 2)
